sector: Consumer Durables - Home Appliances (Washing Machines, Dishwashers)
dataSource: WebSearch aggregation (Trendlyne, MoneyControl, Screener, StockAnalysis, MarketsMojo, BusinessStandard)

Q1_FY2026.notes: Net sales increased 5.45% YoY. Net profit fell 30.31% YoY.

Q2_FY2026.notes: Net profit surged 61.70% YoY. Strong profit recovery.

Q3_FY2026.notes: Revenue Rs 1,382 cr, +12% YoY from Rs 1,232 cr. Net profit declined 22.6% YoY from Rs 34.4 cr (impacted by exceptional loss of Rs 13.38 cr for New Labour Code). Shares plunged 17% post results.

nineMonthFY2026.notes: Nine months Apr-Dec 2025. Revenue grew 12% YoY.

FY2025_TTM.notes: TTM revenue Rs 5,297 cr, profit Rs 122 cr

keyRatios.notes: PE at 14% premium to peers median of 51.54x. PB at 27% premium to peers median of 6.40x. Moderate leverage.

balanceSheetHighlights.notes: D/E of 0.30 - moderate leverage. Market cap Rs 4,973 cr. Conservative debt levels. Manufacturing facilities for washing machines, dishwashers, kitchen appliances.

keyHighlights: Q3 FY26 margin pressure dampens strong revenue growth
Exceptional loss of Rs 13.38 cr for New Labour Code
Revenue growing consistently at 12% in 9M FY26
Q2 FY26 strong profit surge masks underlying margin pressures
Shares plunged 17% post Q3 results announcement
